company.classification: Private Limited Foreign Company Incorporated in India

description.desc_thousand_char: Coca Cola India Private Limited (CCIPL), as per its annual filings, is engaged in the business of processing and sale of non-alcoholic beverage bases, concentrates, and juices. The company markets its products under the brand names Coca-Cola, Thumsup, Sprite, Limca, Fanta, Maaza, Kinley, and many more. The company markets its products through online platforms such as Big Basket, Blinkit, Flipkart, Jiomart, and Amazon. The company was incorporated in 1992 and has its registered office located in Maharashtra.
